question:
Which top 4 leagues had the most games in the 2015-2016 season?
in the 2015-2016 season refers to season = '2015/2016'; league with most games refers to League.name where MAX(COUNT(id))
query: SELECT t1.name FROM League AS t1 INNER JOIN Match AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.league_id WHERE t2.season = '2015/2016' GROUP BY t1.name ORDER BY COUNT(t2.id) DESC NULLS LAST LIMIT 4
